recipes.name: Oatmeal
recipes.description: Simple breakfast, made quick and easy.

instructions.instruction: Mix water, oatmeal and salt in a pot.
Bring to the boil and let it simmer for a couple of minutes.
Serve with milk and condiment of your choice.

recipes.name: Veggie soup
recipes.description: Rich and flavourful treat for the colder days.

instructions.instruction: Peel and wash all the vegetables.
Cut all the vegetables into even-sized pieces.
Fry everything lightly in a pot with the oil.
Add the water and the broth cubes, let it boil til the veggies are soft.
Taste with salt and pepper.

recipes.name: Greek Salad
recipes.description: Easy to make! You could either have it by it self or as a side dish.

instructions.instruction: Peel and slice the onion.
Dice the cucumber and the tomatoes.
Break the cheese into smaller pieces.
Mix all the vegetables carefully in a bowl.
Mix the oil and vinegar into a dressing.
Pick the leaves of the oregano.
Drizzle the dressing over the salad and top with the oregano leaves and black pepper.

recipes.name: Broccoli Soup
recipes.description: Quick and tasty soup for the green lover.

instructions.instruction: Peel and cut the onion and potatoes.
Dice up the broccoli.
Bring the stock to a boil, add all vegetables.
Let it boil for 10 minutes, or til the veggies are soft.
Mix the soup with a immersion blender or food processor.
Add cooking cream to the soup, season with salt and pepper.

recipes.name: Date snacks
recipes.description: A yummy snack to keep around, with no white sugar.

instructions.instruction: Melt the butter in a small pot. Let it cool.
Cut the dates in half and remove the pits.
Put all ingredients, apart from the coconut, in a food processor.
Mix into a smooth paste.
Roll the paste into balls in the palm of your hands, about 12 pieces.
Add the coconut flakes onto a plate.
Roll the balls in the coconut flakes.
